moreparty


Tools for conditional inference trees and random forests

moreparty has given up GitHub. (See Software Freedom Conservancy’s Give Up GitHub for details.)

You can now find this project at https://framagit.org/nicolas-robette/moreparty instead.

Any use of this project’s code by GitHub Copilot, past or present, is done without our permission. We do not consent to GitHub’s use of this project’s code in Copilot.

Join us : you can give up GitHub too!
